comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
@paulcallen I did this review using Reviewable in Edge. While I had to "always allow" pop-ups to let GitHub authenticate initially, it worked just fine. Edge itself got a little slow, but that's to be expected (Edge has known performance issues).

---

---

---

_[src/Microsoft.PowerShell.CoreCLR.Eventing/project.json, line 25 [r1]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/powershell/powershell/734#-KDZqME2X3ruDB8GxjEN:-KDZqME2X3ruDB8GxjEO:-291683542) ([raw file](https://github.com/powershell/powershell/blob/ea41c398593b526d1db628360a9b15c5e066ba74/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.CoreCLR.Eventing/project.json#L25)):_
These are unrelated to this PR but were necessary to quiet NuGet warnings because a prior PR was merged out-of-date.

---

_[src/TypeCatalogGen/build.sh, line 2 [r1]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/powershell/powershell/734#-KDZqCG42shQhFZPKe9f:-KDZqCG42shQhFZPKe9g:-703793385) ([raw file](https://github.com/powershell/powershell/blob/ea41c398593b526d1db628360a9b15c5e066ba74/src/TypeCatalogGen/build.sh#L2)):_
I tried to remove this remaining Mono dependency by building the generator for .NET Core. While I could get it to build successfully, it had a strange issue starting.

---

_[src/TypeCatalogGen/build.sh, line 10 [r1]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/powershell/powershell/734#-KDZq2w8Qy7gZJ4y8_uT:-KDZq2w8Qy7gZJ4y8_uU:1224894279) ([raw file](https://github.com/powershell/powershell/blob/ea41c398593b526d1db628360a9b15c5e066ba74/src/TypeCatalogGen/build.sh#L10)):_
This is hard-coded because it is the output file that the ALC expects, and the input file the generator expects.

---

_[src/TypeCatalogParser/Main.cs, line 17 [r1]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/powershell/powershell/734#-KDZprE6uDUEbbbZbVZO:-KDZprE6uDUEbbbZbVZP:612515951) ([raw file](https://github.com/powershell/powershell/blob/ea41c398593b526d1db628360a9b15c5e066ba74/src/TypeCatalogParser/Main.cs#L17)):_
This is hard-coded because it's what the type catalog generator is expecting.

---

_[src/TypeCatalogParser/Main.cs, line 20 [r1]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/powershell/powershell/734#-KDZpvBOQT1TzMYjc7L7:-KDZpvBOQT1TzMYjc7L8:1920695584) ([raw file](https://github.com/powershell/powershell/blob/ea41c398593b526d1db628360a9b15c5e066ba74/src/TypeCatalogParser/Main.cs#L20)):_
This is hard coded because Linux.Host is our top level project, and this must be done only for the .NET Core framework.

---

_[test/powershell/DotNetInterop.Tests.ps1, line 3 [r1]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/powershell/powershell/734#-KDZotLdqs20UTkrwMkb:-KDZotLeONUpxXp2u1Bp:-1377625441) ([raw file](https://github.com/powershell/powershell/blob/ea41c398593b526d1db628360a9b15c5e066ba74/test/powershell/DotNetInterop.Tests.ps1#L3)):_
